contents.text: Welcome to BetterUp in San Francisco, where we help organizations drive lasting behavior change.
For new business inquiries and tailored employee engagement solutions, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative about our B2B software and services, press 1.
Thank you for your patience. Please hold while we connect you to our Sales team.

navigationGoals: Get enterprise pricing details for a corporate coaching package
I want information on corporate coaching packages to support our company’s veteran reintegration program.
Discuss enterprise sales options and pricing for BetterUp’s employee engagement platform.
I need to speak with someone about purchasing BetterUp for my organization
I’d like to discuss pricing and licensing options for group coaching seats for my physics research team.

contents.text: To schedule a free demonstration of our transformation platform, press 2.
One moment please, we will connect you to schedule your demo shortly.

navigationGoals: Book a time next week for a live demo of the transformation platform
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of BetterUp’s transformation platform for my team’s mentoring initiative.
Arrange a technical demo of the transformation platform, focusing on analytics and integrations.
I’d like to schedule a free demo to see how the platform works
I want to schedule a demo of the BetterUp transformation platform to evaluate it for our student organization.

contents.text: For support with your existing coaching programs and account services, press 2.
For technical assistance with the BetterUp platform, press 1.
We appreciate your call. Please hold while we transfer you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Fix the login error that’s blocking access to my coaching dashboard
I need technical help accessing my BetterUp coaching dashboard and session materials.
Get technical assistance troubleshooting our API integration with the BetterUp platform.
I’m having trouble logging into my coaching portal and need technical help
I’m encountering an error logging into the BetterUp app for my coaching program and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For coaching program updates and account management, press 2.
Your call is important. Please hold while we connect you to your Account Manager.

navigationGoals: Update our company’s billing info and confirm upcoming session dates
I’d like to update my current coaching plan and adjust my session schedule with my coach.
Modify our coaching program configuration and update account billing and user assignments.
I want to update details on my current coaching program and account
I need to reschedule my upcoming coaching session and update my account details for my current program.
